title: KSI's trainer Viddal Riley signs promotional deal with Floyd Mayweather
text:

KSI's trainer Viddal Riley has signed his own promotional deal with Floyd Mayweather.

The 22-year-old Londoner has won each of this three professional fights to date since making his debut last November.

He will be in KSI's corner for his rematch against Logan Paul on November 9 before turning his attention back to his own career.

And Riley, who is trained by Floyd's uncle Jeff Mayweather, will now have the backing of the retired superstar.

“Signing to Mayweather Promotions is the biggest mark in my career thus far" he said. " I am now attached to the biggest name in boxing and I Iook to make similar history once I reach the heights of my career with the help of Mayweather Promotions and my team.

(Image: Mayweather Promotions)

"My future goal in boxing is to become a fighter who can sell out arenas and generate huge PPV numbers like the legend, Floyd Mayweather.

"If you’re not aware of the name yet, it’s Viddal Riley. Expect entertainment in multiple forms and ring IQ beyond my years."

KSI, who fought to a draw with Paul in Manchester last year, added: "From the first time I met him I knew he was something special.

"He’s helped me become the beast I am today in boxing. I meant what I said after the Joe Weller fight that Viddal would become a world champion.

(Image: Mayweather Promotions)

“Now that he’s signed with Mayweather Promotions, for me, that accolade is now set in stone. Get ready for Viddal Riley!”

And CEO of Mayweather promotions Leonard Ellerbe added: “We’re very excited to add this young man to our roster.

"He knows he’s in great hands in terms of guiding his career in the right direction, and he has the whole UK supporting him.

"Viddal Riley is the whole package across the board and his charisma will take him far. We look forward to what his future holds and we welcome him to Mayweather Promotions team with pleasure."
description: Riley will be in KSI's corner on November 9 for his rematch against fellow YouTuber Logan Paul
